body:
PirlGuard just adds a 50/60 block finality. Anything over 60 blocks is
ignored. Set all exchanges to 120 confirms. Problem solved. Thats it.

On Mon, 17 Aug 2020 at 07:16, Dexaran <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Adopting each other's solutions, sharing research, sharing ideas, and
> building on the back what already exists are definitely good practice in
> the programming and blockchain industry.
>
> This was the original reason for the creation of "Ethereum Commonwealth"
> <https://github.com/EthereumCommonwealth> - we must avoid duplication of
> work and spend efforts on what has already been done.
>
> I'm glad to see like-minded persons here.
>
> Divided we fail:
> https://medium.com/s/story/divided-we-fail-the-irrational-insanity-of-crypto-tribalism-6acc54465769
>
> â€”
